NC.Q: Between the flows from node Deceased to node Medication and from node Nursing Homes to node Improved Condition, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Deceased to node Medication and from node Pharmacies to node Improved Condition, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Nursing Homes to node Deceased, from node Oncology to node Clinics, and from node Nursing Homes to node Improved Condition, which path has the largest flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Stable Condition to node Medication, from node Pediatrics to node Pharmacies, and from node Clinics to node Deceased, which path has the largest flow?
